ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Supports image files and graphic objects to be visualized in 'ggplot2' graphic system.
Supports image files and graphic objects to be visualized in 'ggplot2' graphic system.

name: r-ggimage
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.3.5" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ggimage
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ggimage_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ggimage/ggimage_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 966915d45a4179650a273ad55f8f0fc8acccedeb65191144f98a299d06e3b833

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-ggfun
    - r-ggiraph
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-ggplotify
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-magick
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-scales
    - r-tibble
    - r-withr
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-ggfun
    - r-ggiraph
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-ggplotify
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-magick
    - r-purrr
    - r-rlang
    - r-scales
    - r-tibble
    - r-withr

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ggimage')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ggimage')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/GuangchuangYu/ggimage (devel), https://yulab-smu.top/pkgdocs/ggimage.html (vignette)
  license: Artistic-2.0
  summary: Supports image files and graphic objects to be visualized in 'ggplot2' graphic system.
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/Artistic-2.0

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# The original CRAN metadata for this package was:
# Package: ggimage
# Title: Use Image in 'ggplot2'
# Version: 0.3.1
# Authors@R: person("Guangchuang", "Yu", email = "guangchuangyu@gmail.com", role = c("aut", "cre"), comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-6485-8781"))
# Description: Supports image files and graphic objects to be visualized in 'ggplot2' graphic system.
# Depends: R (>= 3.4.0), ggplot2
# Imports: ggfun, ggplotify, grid, jsonlite, magick, methods, scales, tibble, tools, utils
# Suggests: ape, ggtree, gridGraphics, httr, rsvg
# ByteCompile: true
# License: Artistic-2.0
# URL: https://github.com/GuangchuangYu/ggimage (devel), https://yulab-smu.top/pkgdocs/ggimage.html (vignette)
# BugReports: https://github.com/GuangchuangYu/ggimage/issues
# Encoding: UTF-8
# RoxygenNote: 7.1.2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2022-04-25 01:58:04 UTC; ygc
# Author: Guangchuang Yu [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6485-8781>)
# Maintainer: Guangchuang Yu <guangchuangyu@gmail.com>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2022-04-25 06:40:10 UTC
# See
# https://docs.conda.io/projects/conda-build for
# more information about meta.yaml
